Question: Which of the following statements accurately describes events involving Bill, Amsterdam, and Priest Vallon in *Gangs of New York*?

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the transformation of Amsterdam to New York City in the context of the skyline changes?
Options:

B. b) Amsterdam and Jenny experience a transition to modern New York City.
C. c) The skyline transformation highlights traditional landmarks from Amsterdam.

Answer: a) The skyline of New York City includes the World Trade Center. and d) The World Trade Center is part of the modern New York City skyline.
